last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 4
last_episode_to_air.overview: On the run, Bundy steals a van. He spots 14 year old Leslie Parmenter who's waiting for a ride. He pulls over and questions her. Leslie panics, but her brother arrives just in time.

name: Ted Bundy: The Survivors
overview: Ted Bundy's a murderer masquerading as a charming law student. His murders are shocking, but the stories of women who survived are inspiring.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Karen Sparks is a young dancer. One night, Ted Bundy breaks into her basement apartment and savagely attacks her. Weeks later, Karen wakes from a coma.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: After abducting and murdering two Seattle women in one day, Bundy moves to fresh killing grounds in Utah.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Ted Bundy escapes to Florida. His lust for murder is so overwhelming, he can barely control himself. After some attacks, Kathy Kleiner is one of the few to survive.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: On the run, Bundy steals a van. He spots 14 year old Leslie Parmenter who's waiting for a ride. He pulls over and questions her. Leslie panics, but her brother arrives just in time.
